Wednesday afternoon’s lineup of the best Android game and app deals is now ready to roll with titles like Exolotl: Zian, Munchkin, Halls of Torment, Dune: Imperium, and more. We also happen to have just got all of the official deals and details on the upcoming 2025 Google Black Friday sale alongside this new all-time low on the Google TV Streamer 4K, the best price yet on Lenovo’s 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet, a $100 price drop on Galaxy Watch 8, and Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 at $440 off. All of the apps are waiting down below.

items.title: PDF Expert lifetime access for Mac is now $60 off
items.summary:
If you work with PDFs frequently, you know they can get frustrating: flipping signature boxes, blocking date edits, and forcing you through multiple apps just to combine two pages. If you’re over the nonsense, this might help: PDF Expert Premium for Mac is now $79.99 (Reg. $139.99) — it’s the lowest price in November and a smart way to handle PDFs long-term.

items.title: Valve is going big on hardware with all-new Steam Machine, Frames VR headset, and a controller
items.summary:
Following the success of Steam Deck, Valve is doubling down on the hardware department with a range of new hardware. Leading the pack is the all-new Steam Machine, which you’ll be able to pair with long-rumored VR headset called the Steam Frame. There’s also a brand-new Steam Controller to go with the new console, which you’ll be able to bundle with the console itself or buy separately. With these new additions joining the already popular Steam Deck, it’s safe to say that Valve is betting big on hardware, going head-to-head with the likes of Sony and Microsoft. Head below for a closer look and more details.

more…

items.title: Cut, splice, and extend Govee’s Permanent Outdoor Matter Prism Lights starting from a $430 low
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering its new 100-foot Permanent Outdoor Lights Prism with Matter for $429.99 shipped, matching the price we’re seeing direct from the brand’s website. These new outdoor ambient lights hit the market back at the end of September, and would normally fetch $540 at full price, though they’ve been keeping down at $459 since mid-October after rising from the previous fall to this same rate. Today’s deal gives you another shot at the best price we have tracked, letting you upgrade your outdoor lighting with $110 in total savings. You can also find its 200-foot model down at the second-lowest price of $729.99 shipped, from $860.

This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $290 price tag, and this unit here without the included Lenovo Pen typically goes for $270. It dropped to $200 earlier this month before quickly bouncing back up, but it’s now seeing an additional $10 off. That makes this the lowest price we’ve seen yet for this tablet, so be sure to snag it while the deal lasts. Alternatively, you can score the variant with an included stylus for $208.99 shipped from Lenovo. Head below for more details.
